statement.title: Content
statement.content: There is a positive integer $N$,satisfied that $ \frac{N} { a\_1}$ equals $K\_1^{a\_1}$, $ \frac{N} { a\_2}$ equals $K\_2^{a\_2}$ and so on. Then, I want you to tell me the smallest $N$.

statement.title: Standard Input
statement.content: Input is a integer $n(1 \leq n \leq 6)$, then n numbers $a\_i (16 < ai \leq 1000 )$described above.

statement.title: Standard Output
statement.content: If there exists such a $N$,output $N$ mod $19880502$, else `-1` instead.

statement.title: Samples
statement.content:
Input Output
1 323 2 17 19323 3493625

statement.title: Note
statement.content: The data used in this problem is unofficial data prepared by VioletWall. So any mistake here does not imply mistake in the offcial judge data.
